text: Thomas Crane (1808–1859) was an English portrait painter. Thomas or Tom Crane may also refer to: *Thomas Crane (1843–1903), English illustrator and designer, son of the painter *Thomas Frederick Crane (1844–1927), American folklorist, academic, and lawyer * Thomas Crane (died 1882), American businessman and namesake of Massachusetts' Thomas Crane Public Library *Thomas Crane, Australian singer and Australia's Got Talent contestant *Tom Crane (footballer) (1921–2010), Australian rules footballer *Tom Crane, character on the 1979 TV series The Omega Factor
title: Thomas Crane (disambiguation)
